name: Lambs to the Slaughter EP
description:
(2009)

The debut concept EP. Self produced, featuring Tempest Rising and Birth of the Digital God, Lambs to the Slaughter is a social statement on human behavior, telling a story of the problem... and the potential consequences.


"The first thing that impressed me is that listening to the full EP is like reading a book. Everything is in order" - Gulf Coast Music

"It’s a really nice balance of blood lust and atomic doom... this is fucking brilliant" - The Music Blogs

"Kaamora could be the biggest progressive metal band to come out of Australia if they continue making music like ‘Lambs to the Slaughter’" - Wren Music Reviews

Track listing:

- Into the Storm
- Tempest Rising
- Ruptured
- Educating the Worms
- Soul of a Machine
- Birth of the Digital God
- End of an Aeon

Approx running time: 32 mins.
